body.p: We the under Signed citisens and neighbors of William Morgan pray the honorable governor of Kentucky to Remit a fine ^of $18,^ imposed on Said Wm Morgan in a Suit of assalt and Battery Charged against him by Nancy Morgan in which case Said defendant pleads not guilty, we therefore from pray your honor to Remit Said fine Believeing the defendant to be a good Civil industrious and peaceable citizen. Said Morgan is a of man in indigent Circumstances we the under signers therfore petition a Remitance of Said fine

W H Knap
